alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Larue; Nelson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 1:13PM EDT until May 16 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Nelson County in central Kentucky... North central Larue County in central Kentucky... East central Hardin County in central Kentucky... * Until 200 PM EDT. * At 113 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Elizabethtown, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Bardstown, New Haven, Lyons, Gethsemane, Athertonville, Blue Gap, Samuels Field Airport, Bellwood and Culvertown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm may cause serious injury and significant property damage.
